vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="720" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o6YqjatUUTi-p8Pt1zlv-33" value="<h1>Total History Knowledge System</h1><h2>With timestamp metadata to query for recent events + add time dimension (causality)</h2>" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
